entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 6:20 PM PST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
